net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class SimpleMarkupStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.AbstractStrategy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.AbstractTradingStrategy
          net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
              net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.SimpleMarkupStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class SimpleMarkupStrategy
extends FixedQuantityStrategyImpl

A strategy which sets the current price and direction of the agent's order based on a forecast of the next period price, as specified by the agent's valuation policy.

See Also:
ReturnForecastValuationPolicy, Serialized Form
